    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2869</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A book on the shelf - guide.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Buch auf dem Regal - Anleitung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un livre sur l'étagère - guide.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um livro na prateleira - guia.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un libro sulla mensola - guida.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα βιβλίο στο ράφι - οδηγός.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un libro en el estante - guía.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a written activity where students write a convincing recommendation for a book which they have read, to be included in their library.Includes an assessment Rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recommendation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">books</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">library</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine schriftliche Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer eine überzeugende Empfehlung für ein Buch schreiben, 
welches sie gelesen haben, in ihrem library.Includes eingeschlossen 
werden eine Einschätzung Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité écrite où les 
étudiants écrivent une recommandation persuasive pour un livre ce 
qu'ils ont lu, être inclus dans leur library.Includes une rubrique 
d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade escrita onde os 
estudantes escrevam uma recomendação convencendo para um livro qual 
leram, para ser incluído em seu library.Includes um rubric da 
avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività scritta dove gli 
allievi scrivono una raccomandazione convincente per un libro quale 
hanno letto, essere incluso nel loro library.Includes una rubrica di 
valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια γραπτή δραστηριότητα 
όπου οι σπουδαστές γράφουν μια πειστική σύσταση για ένα βιβλίο 
που έχουν διαβάσει, που περιλαμβάνεται στη βιβλιοθήκη τους 
περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad escrita donde 
los estudiantes escriben una recomendación convincente para un libro 
cuál han leído, ser incluido en su library.Includes una rúbrica del
gravamen.</string>
          </description>
